attributes.action: We call upon MPs to support the Lords' amendments to the EU (NoW) Bill
attributes.background:
We call upon the elected house to support the Lords' amendments to the EU (Notice of Withdrawal) Bill. 

The amendments do not infringe the 'will of the people' to leave the EU, whilst granting sovereign Parliament control and security for valued members of our communities.

rejection.details:
The Lords' amendments to the European Union (Notification of Withdrawal) Bill  2016-17 were disagreed with by the House of Commons on 13 March 2017.

You can read a transcript of this debate here: 

https://hansard.parliament.uk/commons/2017-03-13/debates/7B70DCB0-A791-4B45-B01E-04D5689E8E62/EuropeanUnion(NotificationOfWithdrawal)Bill

You may wish to sign these petitions instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/182723

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/182254
